  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.webservice.addressbook.contactapi.ABContactAPISearchSpec

    Deprecated. 
    (Since 8.0.0) Please use ABContactSearchSpec instead.

extends java.lang.Object
implements GWRemotable
    Specifies search result control parameters.

      • isGetNumResultsOnly

        public boolean isGetNumResultsOnly()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        If true, only number of results will be returned, not the results. This is very useful in paging.

      • setGetNumResultsOnly

        public void setGetNumResultsOnly(boolean getNumResultsOnly)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        getNumResultsOnly - If set to true, only number of results will be returned, not the results. This is very useful in paging.

      • getSortColumns

        public ABContactSearchSortColumn[] getSortColumns()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        Specifies the sort order of the results. Either null or an empty array can be used to specify that order of results is unimportant.

      • setSortColumns

        public void setSortColumns(ABContactSearchSortColumn[] sortColumns)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        sortColumns - Specifies the sort order of the results. Either null or an empty array can be used to specify that order of results is unimportant.

        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        Specifies the first row to return.

        Deprecated.

        Specifies the number of results to return.

      • isExcludeTotal

        public boolean isExcludeTotal()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        Determines whether to exclude the total number of results in the search result.

      • setExcludeTotal

        public void setExcludeTotal(boolean excludeTotal)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        excludeTotal - Determines whether to include the total number of results in the search result.

      • isWideSearch

        public boolean isWideSearch()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        Determines whether to search a wider range of contacts. If true falls back to ABCompany, ABPerson and ABPlace instead of chosing specific search strategies for each subtype.

      • setWideSearch

        public void setWideSearch(boolean wideSearch)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        wideSearch - Whether to search a wider range of contacts. If true falls back to ABCompany, ABPerson and ABPlace instead of chosing specific search strategies for each subtype.

      • getSubtypeFilter

        public ABContactSubtypeFilter getSubtypeFilter()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        Specifies the subtypes to filter out. null can be used to specify that no filtering is needed.

      • setSubtypeFilter

        public void setSubtypeFilter(ABContactSubtypeFilter subtypeFilter)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        subtypeFilter - Specifies the subtypes to filter out. null can be used to specify that no filtering is needed.

      • getTagMatcher

        public ABContactTagMatcher getTagMatcher()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the matcher for restricting tags

      • setTagMatcher

        public void setTagMatcher(ABContactTagMatcher tagMatcher)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        tagMatcher - Specifies the tags to match. null or an empty matcher will match on any tag.

        Deprecated.
